member.name: EMRCREATECOLORSPACEW
member.summary: The EMRCREATECOLORSPACEW structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record. It differs from in that it has a Unicode logical color space and also has an optional array containing raw source profile data.

member.name: EMRCREATECOLORSPACEW.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRCREATECOLORSPACEW.ihCS
member.summary: Index of the color space in handle table.

member.name: EMRCREATECOLORSPACEW.lcs
member.summary: Logical color space. Note, this is the Unicode version of the structure.

listheader.description: Indicates that a color space is embedded in the metafile.

member.name: EMRCREATECOLORSPACEW.cbData
member.summary: Size of the raw source profile data in bytes, if it is attached.

member.name: EMRCREATECOLORSPACEW.Data
member.summary: An array containing the source profile data. The size of the array is cbData.
